table.name: area_type
table.remarks: Code list of area types. Identifies the types of area (calculated, official, survey defined, etc) that can be recorded for a parcel (a.k.a. cadastre object). Implementation of the LADM LA_AreaType class. Tags: Reference Table, LADM Reference Object

column.name: code
column.remarks: LADM Definition: The code for the area type.

column.name: display_value
column.remarks: LADM Definition: Displayed value of the area type.

column.name: description
column.remarks: LADM Definition: Description of the area type.

column.name: status
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Status of the area type

table.name: building_unit_type
table.remarks: Code list of building unit types. Identifies the types of building unit that can exist on a parcel. Implementation of the LADM LA_BuildingUnitType class. Not used by SOLA. Tags: Reference Table, LADM Reference Object, Not Used

column.name: code
column.remarks: LADM Definition: The code for the building unit type.

column.name: display_value
column.remarks: LADM Definition: Displayed value of the building unit type.

column.name: description
column.remarks: LADM Definition: Description of the building unit type.

column.name: status
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Status of the building unit type

table.name: cadastre_object
table.remarks: Specialization of Spatial Unit that represents primary cadastral features such as parcels. Parcels captured in SOLA should have a spatial definition that illustrates the shape and geographic location of the parcel although this is not a mandatory requirement. Parcels without a spatial definition may be referred to as aspatial or textual parcels. Tags: FLOSS SOLA Extension, Change History

column.name: id
column.remarks: Identifier for the cadastre object.

column.name: type_code
column.remarks: The type of cadastre object. E.g. parcel, building unit, etc.

column.name: building_unit_type_code
column.remarks: The building unit subtype if applicable. Not used by SOLA.

column.name: approval_datetime
column.remarks: The datetime the cadastre object was approved/registered.

column.name: historic_datetime
column.remarks: The datetime the cadastre object was superseded and became historic.

column.name: source_reference
column.remarks: Used to indicate the original source of the cadastre object. Can be a map reference or a reference to the system the geometry was migrated from.

column.name: name_firstpart
column.remarks: The first part of the name or reference assigned by the land administration agency to identify the cadastre object. E.g. lot number, etc

column.name: name_lastpart
column.remarks: The remaining part of the name or reference assigned by the land administration agency to identify the cadastre object. E.g. survey plan number, map number, section reference, etc.

column.name: status_code
column.remarks: The status of the cadastre object.

column.name: geom_polygon
column.remarks: The PostGIS geometry for the cadastre object. Must be a ploygon. Multipolygon geometries are not currently supported by SOLA.

column.name: transaction_id
column.remarks: Reference to the SOLA transaction that created the cadastre object.

column.name: land_use_code
column.remarks: Code to indicate the general purpose of the cadastre object. E.g. Commerical, Residential, Industrial, etc.

column.name: rowidentifier
column.remarks: Identifies the all change records for the row in the cadastre_object_historic table

column.name: rowversion
column.remarks: Sequential value indicating the number of times this row has been modified.

column.name: change_action
column.remarks: Indicates if the last data modification action that occurred to the row was insert (i), update (u) or delete (d).

column.name: change_user
column.remarks: The user id of the last person to modify the row.

column.name: change_time
column.remarks: The date and time the row was last modified.

column.name: classification_code
column.remarks: FROM SOLA State Land Extension: The security classification for this Parcel. Only users with the security classification (or a higher classification) will be able to view the record. If null, the record is considered unrestricted.

column.name: redact_code
column.remarks: FROM SOLA State Land Extension: The redact classification for this Parcel. Only users with the redact classification (or a higher classification) will be able to view the record with un-redacted fields. If null, the record is considered unrestricted and no redaction to the record will occur unless bulk redaction classifications have been set for fields of the record.

table.name: cadastre_object_node_target
table.remarks: Used to store coordinate details for new or modified nodes during the Redefine Cadastre process. Tags: FLOSS SOLA Extension, Change History

column.name: transaction_id
column.remarks: Identifier for the transaction the node is associated with.

column.name: node_id
column.remarks: Identifier for the node.

column.name: geom
column.remarks: The geometry of the node containing the coordinate details.

column.name: rowidentifier
column.remarks: Identifies the all change records for the row in the cadastre_object_node_target_historic table

column.name: rowversion
column.remarks: Sequential value indicating the number of times this row has been modified.

column.name: change_action
column.remarks: Indicates if the last data modification action that occurred to the row was insert (i), update (u) or delete (d).

column.name: change_user
column.remarks: The user id of the last person to modify the row.

column.name: change_time
column.remarks: The date and time the row was last modified.

table.name: cadastre_object_target
table.remarks: Used to identify cadastre objects that are being changed or cancelled by a cadastre related transaction (i.e. Change Cadastre or Redefine Cadastre). These changes are considered pending/unofficial and do not affect the registered state of the cadastre object until the transaction is approved. Note that new cadastre objects are created in the cadastre_object table with a status of pending and they are not recorded in this table. Tags: FLOSS SOLA Extension, Change History

column.name: transaction_id
column.remarks: Identifier for the transaction the cadastre object is being affected by.

column.name: cadastre_object_id
column.remarks: Identifier for the cadastre object.

column.name: geom_polygon
column.remarks: The new geometry of the cadastre object as a result of the cadastre transaction.

column.name: rowidentifier
column.remarks: Identifies the all change records for the row in the cadastre_object_target_historic table

column.name: rowversion
column.remarks: Sequential value indicating the number of times this row has been modified.

column.name: change_action
column.remarks: Indicates if the last data modification action that occurred to the row was insert (i), update (u) or delete (d).

column.name: change_user
column.remarks: The user id of the last person to modify the row.

column.name: change_time
column.remarks: The date and time the row was last modified.

table.name: cadastre_object_type
table.remarks: Code list of cadastre object types. E.g. parcel, building_unit, road, etc. Tags: FLOSS SOLA Extension, Reference Table

column.name: code
column.remarks: The code for the cadastre object type.

column.name: display_value
column.remarks: Displayed value of the cadastre object type.

column.name: description
column.remarks: Description of the cadastre object type.

column.name: status
column.remarks: Status of the cadastre object type

column.name: in_topology
column.remarks: Flag to indicate that all cadastre objects of this type must obey topological conventions such as no gaps or overlaps between objects with the same type.

table.name: dimension_type
table.remarks: Code list of dimension types. Identifies the number of dimensions used to define a spatial unit. E.g. 1D, 2D, etc. Implementation of the LADM LA_DimensionType class. SOLA assumes all spatial units are 2D. Tags: Reference Table, LADM Reference Object

column.name: code
column.remarks: LADM Definition: The code for the dimension type.

column.name: display_value
column.remarks: LADM Definition: Displayed value of the dimension type.

column.name: description
column.remarks: LADM Definition: Description of the dimension type.

column.name: status
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Status of the dimension type

table.name: Function: add_topo_points
table.remarks: Alters the topology of the target geometry by merging selected coordinates from the source geometry into the target geometry. Only those coordinates from the source geometry that are within the map-tolerance distance of the target geometry boundary are merged. Used during spatial editing of parcels to ensure parcels adjacent of the edit remain topologically consistent with any new parcels.

table.name: Function: cadastre_object_name_is_valid
table.remarks: Verifies that the name assigned to a new cadastre object is consistent with the cadastre object naming rules.

table.name: Function: generate_spatial_unit_group_name
table.remarks: Determines the hierarchical name to assign a new Spatial Unit Group.

table.name: Function: get_map_center_label
table.remarks: Returns a value that is displayed in the centre of the Public Display Maps for Systematic Registration. This function has default code that should be updated for each implementation of SOLA.

table.name: Function: get_new_cadastre_object_identifier_first_part
table.remarks: Used to determine the value for the first name part for a new cadastre object. This function has default code that should be updated for each implementation of SOLA to match the cadastre object naming conventions used by the implementing organisation.

table.name: Function: get_new_cadastre_object_identifier_last_part
table.remarks: Used to determine the value for the last name part for a new cadastre object. This function has default code that should be updated for each implementation of SOLA to match the cadastre object naming conventions used by the implementing organisation.

table.name: Function: snap_geometry_to_geometry
table.remarks: Snaps one geometry to the other adding points if required. Not used by SOLA.

table.name: hierarchy
table.remarks: First (highest) level of the hierarchical spatial unit group object of a hierarchical structure such as administrative rights.

table.name: hierarchy_level
table.remarks: Code list of hierarchy levels. Used by Systematic Registration functionalty when defining Spatial Unit Groups. Tags: FLOSS SOLA Extension, Reference Table

column.name: code
column.remarks: The code for the hierarchy level.

column.name: display_value
column.remarks: Displayed value of the hierarchy level.

column.name: description
column.remarks: Description of the hierarchy level.

column.name: status
column.remarks: Status of the hierarchy level

table.name: land_use_type
table.remarks: Code list of land use types. Identifies the general purpose of a cadastre object or property. E.g. Commerical, Residential, Industrial, etc. Implementation of the LADM ExtLandUse class. Tags: Reference Table, LADM Reference Object

column.name: code
column.remarks: LADM Definition: The code for the land use type.

column.name: display_value
column.remarks: LADM Definition: Displayed value of the land use type.

column.name: description
column.remarks: LADM Definition: Description of the land use type.

column.name: status
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Status of the land use type

table.name: legal_space_utility_network
table.remarks: LADM Defintion: A utility network concerns legal space, which does not necessarily coincide with the physical space of a utility network. Implementation of the LADM LA_LegalSpaceUtilityNetwork class. Not used by SOLA. Tags: LADM Reference Object, Change History, Not Used

column.name: id
column.remarks: LADM Definition: Legal space utility network identifier.

column.name: ext_physical_network_id
column.remarks: LADM Definition: External identifier for a physical utility network.

column.name: status_code
column.remarks: LADM Definition: Status code for the legal space utility network.

column.name: type_code
column.remarks: LADM Definition: Type code for the legal space utility network.

column.name: geom
column.remarks: LADM Definition: Not provided.

column.name: rowidentifier
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Identifies the all change records for the row in the legal_space_utility_network_historic table

column.name: rowversion
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Sequential value indicating the number of times this row has been modified.

column.name: change_action
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Indicates if the last data modification action that occurred to the row was insert (i), update (u) or delete (d).

column.name: change_user
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: The user id of the last person to modify the row.

column.name: change_time
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: The date and time the row was last modified.

table.name: level
table.remarks: LADM Definition: A set of spatial units, with geometric, and/or topological, and/or thematic coherence. EXAMPLE 1 - One level for an urban cadastre and another level for a rural cadastre. EXAMPLE 2 - One level with rights and another with restrictions. EXAMPLE 3 - One level with formal rights, a second level with informal rights and a third level with customary rights. EXAMPLE 4 - One level with point based spaital units, a second level with line based spatial units, and a third level with polygon based spatial features. Implementation of the LADM LA_Level class. Used by SOLA to identify the set of spatial features for each layer displayed in the Map Viewer. Tags: Reference Table, LADM Reference Object, Change History

column.name: id
column.remarks: LADM Definition: Level identifier.

column.name: name
column.remarks: LADM Definition: The name of the level.

column.name: register_type_code
column.remarks: LADM Definition: The register type of the content of the level. E.g. all, forest, mining, rural, urban, etc

column.name: structure_code
column.remarks: LADM Definition: Code for the structure of the level geometry. E.g. point, polygon, sketch, etc.

column.name: type_code
column.remarks: LADM Definition: The type of content of the level.

column.name: rowidentifier
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Identifies the all change records for the row in the level_historic table

column.name: rowversion
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Sequential value indicating the number of times this row has been modified.

column.name: change_action
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Indicates if the last data modification action that occurred to the row was insert (i), update (u) or delete (d).

column.name: change_user
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: The user id of the last person to modify the row.

column.name: change_time
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: The date and time the row was last modified.

column.name: editable
column.remarks: It shows if the spatial units of this level are editable from the spatial unit editor.

table.name: level_config_map_layer
table.remarks: It provides for each level which layers in the map are used for visualisation

table.name: level_content_type
table.remarks: Code list of level content types. E.g. geographicLocator, building, customary, primaryRight, etc. Implementation of the LADM LA_LevelContentType class. Tags: Reference Table, LADM Reference Object

column.name: code
column.remarks: LADM Definition: The code for the level content type.

column.name: display_value
column.remarks: LADM Definition: Displayed value of the level content type.

column.name: description
column.remarks: LADM Definition: Description of the level content type.

column.name: status
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Status of the level content type

table.name: place_name
table.remarks: View for retrieving place name features for display in the Map Viewer. Not used by SOLA. Layer queries (defined in system.query) are used instead.

table.name: register_type
table.remarks: Code list of register types. E.g. all, forest, mining, rural, urban, etc. Implementation of the LADM LA_RegisterType class. Tags: Reference Table, LADM Reference Object

column.name: code
column.remarks: LADM Definition: The code for the register type.

column.name: display_value
column.remarks: LADM Definition: Displayed value of the register type.

column.name: description
column.remarks: LADM Definition: Description of the register type.

column.name: status
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Status of the register type

table.name: road
table.remarks: View for retrieving road and road centreline features for display in the Map Viewer. Not used by SOLA. Layer queries (defined in system.query) are used instead.

table.name: spatial_unit
table.remarks: Single area (or multiple areas) of land, water or a single volume (or multiple volumes) of space. Implementation of the LADM LA_SpatialUnit class. Can be used by SOLA to represent geographic features such as place names and roading centrelines that are not considered as cadastre objects. Tags: LADM Reference Object, Change History

column.name: id
column.remarks: LADM Definition: Spatial unit identifier.

column.name: dimension_code
column.remarks: LADM Definition: Code for dimension.

column.name: label
column.remarks: LADM Definition: Label for the spatial unit. Used by SOLA as the label to display for the feature in the Map Viewer.

column.name: surface_relation_code
column.remarks: LADM Definition: Code indicating if the spatial unit is above or below the surface.

column.name: level_id
column.remarks: LADM Definition: The identifier for the level.

column.name: land_use_code
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Code to indicate the general purpose of the cadastre object. E.g. Commerical, Residential, Industrial, etc.

column.name: reference_point
column.remarks: LADM Definition: The coordinates of a point inside the spatial unit. Only used by SOLA to define point geometries like place names.

column.name: geom
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: The geometry for the spatial unit. Can be any geometry type.

column.name: transaction_id
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: The identifier of the bulk operation transaction that loaded the spatial unit.

column.name: rowidentifier
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Identifies the all change records for the row in the spatial_unit_historic table

column.name: rowversion
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Sequential value indicating the number of times this row has been modified.

column.name: change_action
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Indicates if the last data modification action that occurred to the row was insert (i), update (u) or delete (d).

column.name: change_user
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: The user id of the last person to modify the row.

column.name: change_time
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: The date and time the row was last modified.

table.name: spatial_unit_address
table.remarks: Associates a spatial unit to one or more address records. Tags: FLOSS SOLA Extension, Change History

column.name: spatial_unit_id
column.remarks: Spatial unit identifier.

column.name: address_id
column.remarks: Address identifier

column.name: rowidentifier
column.remarks: Identifies the all change records for the row in the spatial_unit_address_historic table

column.name: rowversion
column.remarks: Sequential value indicating the number of times this row has been modified.

column.name: change_action
column.remarks: Indicates if the last data modification action that occurred to the row was insert (i), update (u) or delete (d).

column.name: change_user
column.remarks: The user id of the last person to modify the row.

column.name: change_time
column.remarks: The date and time the row was last modified.

table.name: spatial_unit_group
table.remarks: Any number of spatial units considered as a single entity. Implementation of the LADM LA_SpatialUnitGroup class. Tags: LADM Reference Object, Change History

column.name: id
column.remarks: LADM Definition: Spatial unit group identifier.

column.name: hierarchy_level
column.remarks: LADM Definition: The level in the hierarchy of the administrative or zoning subdivision.

column.name: label
column.remarks: LADM Definition: Short textual description of the spaital unit group.

column.name: name
column.remarks: LADM Definition: The name of the spatial unit group.

column.name: reference_point
column.remarks: LADM Definition: The coordinates of a point inside the spatial unit group.

column.name: geom
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: The geometry for the spatial unit group. Can be any geometry type.

column.name: found_in_spatial_unit_group_id
column.remarks: LADM Definition: The identifier of the parent spatial unit group that this group is part of.

column.name: seq_nr
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Used to assist with number sequencing and naming of spatial units within the spatial unit group.

column.name: rowidentifier
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Identifies the all change records for the row in the spatial_unit_group_historic table

column.name: rowversion
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Sequential value indicating the number of times this row has been modified.

column.name: change_action
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Indicates if the last data modification action that occurred to the row was insert (i), update (u) or delete (d).

column.name: change_user
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: The user id of the last person to modify the row.

column.name: change_time
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: The date and time the row was last modified.

table.name: spatial_unit_in_group
table.remarks: Associates a spatial unit group to one or more spatial units. Implementation of the LADM LA_SpatialUnitGroup and LA_SpatialUnit relationship. Tags: LADM Reference Object, Change History

column.name: spatial_unit_group_id
column.remarks: Spatial unit group identifier

column.name: spatial_unit_id
column.remarks: Spatial unit identifier.

column.name: rowidentifier
column.remarks: Identifies the all change records for the row in the spatial_unit_in_group_historic table

column.name: rowversion
column.remarks: Sequential value indicating the number of times this row has been modified.

column.name: change_action
column.remarks: Indicates if the last data modification action that occurred to the row was insert (i), update (u) or delete (d).

column.name: change_user
column.remarks: The user id of the last person to modify the row.

column.name: change_time
column.remarks: The date and time the row was last modified.

table.name: spatial_value_area
table.remarks: Identifies the area of a 2 dimensional spatial unit. Implementation of the LADM LA_AreaValue class. Tags: LADM Reference Object, Change History

column.name: spatial_unit_id
column.remarks: Spatial unit identifier.

column.name: type_code
column.remarks: The type of the spatial value area. E.g. officialArea, calculatedArea, etc.

column.name: size
column.remarks: The value of the area. Must be in metres squared and can be converted for display if requried.

column.name: rowidentifier
column.remarks: Identifies the all change records for the row in the spatial_value_area_historic table

column.name: rowversion
column.remarks: Sequential value indicating the number of times this row has been modified.

column.name: change_action
column.remarks: Indicates if the last data modification action that occurred to the row was insert (i), update (u) or delete (d).

column.name: change_user
column.remarks: The user id of the last person to modify the row.

column.name: change_time
column.remarks: The date and time the row was last modified.

table.name: structure_type
table.remarks: Code list of structure types. E.g. point, polygon, sketch, text, etc. Implementation of the LADM LA_StructureType class. Tags: Reference Table, LADM Reference Object

column.name: code
column.remarks: LADM Definition: The code for the structure type.

column.name: display_value
column.remarks: LADM Definition: Displayed value of the structure type.

column.name: description
column.remarks: LADM Definition: Description of the structure type.

column.name: status
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Status of the structure type

table.name: surface_relation_type
table.remarks: Code list of surface relation types. E.g. onSurface, above, below, mixed, etc. Implementation of the LADM LA_SurfaceRelationType class. Tags: Reference Table, LADM Reference Object

column.name: code
column.remarks: LADM Definition: The code for the surface relation type.

column.name: display_value
column.remarks: LADM Definition: Displayed value of the surface relation type.

column.name: description
column.remarks: LADM Definition: Description of the surface relation type.

column.name: status
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Status of the surface relation type

table.name: survey_control
table.remarks: View for retrieving survey control features for display in the Map Viewer. Not used by SOLA. Layer queries (defined in system.query) are used instead.

table.name: survey_point
table.remarks: Used to store new survey point details (i.e. boundary and traverse) when capturing a survey plan into SOLA. Survey points can be used to define new cadastre objects. Tags: FLOSS SOLA Extension, Change History

column.name: transaction_id
column.remarks: Identifier of the transaction that created the survey point.

column.name: id
column.remarks: Identifier for the survey point.

column.name: boundary
column.remarks: Flag to indicate if the survey point is a boundary point (true) or traverse point (false).

column.name: linked
column.remarks: Flag to indicate if the new survey point has been linked to an existing cadastre object boundary node.

column.name: geom
column.remarks: Geometry representing the current position of the survey point.

column.name: original_geom
column.remarks: Geometry representing the original position of the survey point i.e. before it was linked to an existing cadastre object boundary node.

column.name: rowidentifier
column.remarks: Identifies the all change records for the row in the survey_point_historic table

column.name: rowversion
column.remarks: Sequential value indicating the number of times this row has been modified.

column.name: change_action
column.remarks: Indicates if the last data modification action that occurred to the row was insert (i), update (u) or delete (d).

column.name: change_user
column.remarks: The user id of the last person to modify the row.

column.name: change_time
column.remarks: The date and time the row was last modified.

table.name: Trigger Function: f_for_tbl_cadastre_object_trg_geommodify
table.remarks: Function triggered on insert or update to the cadastre_object table. Uses the add_topo_points function to merge the topology of any parcels adjacent to parcel being updated. Only applied if the parcel being updated has a current status.

table.name: Trigger Function: f_for_tbl_cadastre_object_trg_new
table.remarks: Function triggered on insert to the cadastre_object table. Inserts a record in the spatial_unit table for the cadastre_object if no spatial_unit record for the new cadastre_object exists.

table.name: Trigger Function: f_for_tbl_cadastre_object_trg_remove
table.remarks: Function triggered on delete from the cadastre_object table. Cascade deletes the record in the spatial_unit table for the cadastre_object.

table.name: utility_network_status_type
table.remarks: Code list of utility network status types. E.g. inUse, outOfUse, planned, etc. Implementation of the LADM LA_UtilityNetworkStatusType class. Not used by SOLA. Tags: Reference Table, LADM Reference Object, Not Used

column.name: code
column.remarks: LADM Definition: The code for the utility network status type.

column.name: display_value
column.remarks: LADM Definition: Displayed value of the utility network status type.

column.name: description
column.remarks: LADM Definition: Description of the utility network status type.

column.name: status
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Status of the utility network status type

table.name: utility_network_type
table.remarks: Code list of utility network types. E.g. gas, oil, water, etc. Implementation of the LADM LA_UtilityNetworkType class. Not used by SOLA. Tags: Reference Table, LADM Reference Object, Not Used

column.name: code
column.remarks: LADM Definition: The code for the utility network type.

column.name: display_value
column.remarks: LADM Definition: Displayed value of the utility network type.

column.name: description
column.remarks: LADM Definition: Description of the utility network type.

column.name: status
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Status of the utility network type
